title: Apple seeks more control of vehicle software with CarPlay’s new features
itunes:title: Apple seeks more control of vehicle software with CarPlay’s new features
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: Apple has big ambitions for your car. The company recently unveiled the latest version of its automotive software, called Apple CarPlay. It’s what allows you to connect your phone with your car so you can hear route directions on the stereo and see your maps and music on the screen. The new version will let Apple’s operating system take over your entire dashboard, including the gas gauge and speedometer. Marketplace’s Matt Levin explains why this is a big deal for Apple and for carmakers.
